entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Powell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Powell River Airport 11:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
Temperature: 7.7°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 6.7°C
Wind: ESE 29 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
